column5: Full width, clear of obstacles, and clean
column7: Blind intersections have STOP marking and/or a mirror
column8: Clean and free from slipping or stumbling risk
column9: Clean and optimal usage of Visual Controls
column10: Clean and free of objects (stickers/posters) obstructing visibility
column12: Light fixtures well-located and secured properly
column17: Are extension cords used as permanent wiring?
column20: Electrical wires in good condition and not on the floor or squeezed between sharp parts
column22: Objects properly located without risk of falling (including parts)
column23: Dust, vapor, or haze vacuum system used at needed workstations
column25: Adequate, without sharp edges and well-maintained
column27: Tool Protective devices well-used and in good condition
column29: Properly secured to the floor or wall
column33: Objects stored in an orderly fashion
column34: Load capacity is clearly identified and respected
column36: Work area tidy and clear of debris
column37: Is there any work under a suspended load?
column42: Readable posters or pictograms with required PPE are posted at the workstations
column43: In good condition and stored in an appropriate way
column44: Being used at the identified workstations
column45: Lock Out/Tag Out system in place
column46: Check points are identified on the equipment
column47: Lock Out/Tag Out devices are only used for Lock Out/Tag Out purposes
column48: Procedures are respected during repair, Preventative Maintenance (PM), or setup
column51: Located in dry and well-ventilated area
column52: Appropriate carts and protective caps in place during transport and storage
column53: Cylinders labeled with WHMIS code readable/meet standards
column55: Machine guarding in good condition and used
column57: Emergency stop labeled, accessible, and functional
column58: Piping and holding bands are in good condition on hydraulic equipment
column60: The pressure limitation nozzles and the regulators are functional and integral
column61: Valves, piping, and connectors are functional and do not show wear
column62: Flammable products stored in approved containers and flammable liquids cabinet
column63: All containers properly labeled with the WHMIS code
column64: Do all chemical dispensers including stored chemicals have secondary containment?
column65: Are all decanted products are labeled with workplace labels?
column67: Containers are clean, in good condition and closed
column70: No dangerous or recycling waste are in the domestic trash
column72: Accessible, free of obstructions and clean
column74: Has the eyewash been inspected for the month/is it operating?
column75: Have extinguishers in the area been inspected for the month?
column77: Does the first aid cabinet in the area have adequate supplies?
column78: Spill kits are stocked and ready to deploy.
column83: Are Emergency procedures current and posted?
